returns.success: Whether or not the call succeeded.

params.owner: The address whose token is allowed.

returns.remaining: The amount of token `spender` is allowed to transfer on behalf of `owner`.

params.spender: The address to be given rights to transfer.

returns.success: Whether or not the call succeeded.

params.target: The address to be given rights to transfer and destination of the call.

params.owner: The address whose token is allowed.
params.spender: The address to be given rights to transfer.

returns.success: Whether or not the call succeeded.

params.owner: The address to query the balance of.

params.amount: The number of tokens to burn.
The number of tokens to burn.
params.from: The address whose token to burn.

params.newAdmin: The address of the new administrator.

params.user: user address for whom deposit is being done

getAdmin().details: Get the current administrator of this contract.

returns._0: The current administrator of this contract.
whether the address has superOperator rights.
The name of the token collection.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.amount: The number of tokens allowed to spend.
params.target: The destination of the call, allowed to spend the amount specified

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.enabled: set whether the superOperator is enabled or disabled.
params.superOperator: address that will be given/removed superOperator right.

returns._0: The symbol of the token collection.
The total number of tokens in existence.

params.amount: The number of tokens being transfered.
params.to: The recipient address of the tokens being transfered.

returns.success: Whether or not the transfer succeeded.

params.from: The origin address  of the tokens being transferred.
params.to: The recipient address of the tokensbeing  transfered.

returns.success: Whether or not the transfer succeeded.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: Should burn user's tokens. This transaction will be verified when exiting on root chain

Approval(address,address,uint256).notice: emitted when owner grant transfer rights to another address

Transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: emitted when tokens are transfered from one address to another.

addAllowanceIfNeeded(address,address,uin.notice: Increase the allowance for the spender if needed

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the allowance of `spender` for `owner`'s tokens.

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Approve `target` to spend `amount` and call it with data.

decimals().notice: Get the number of decimals for the token collection.

deposit(address,bytes).notice: called when tokens are deposited on root chain

isSuperOperator(address).notice: check whether address `who` is given superOperator rights.

name().notice: Get the name of the token collection.

paidCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Temporarily approve `target` to spend `amount` and call it with data. Previous approvals remains unchanged.

setSuperOperator(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable the ability of `superOperator` to transfer tokens of all (superOperator rights).

symbol().notice: Get the symbol for the token collection.

totalSupply().notice: Get the total number of tokens in existence.

withdraw(uint256).notice: called when user wants to withdraw tokens back to root chain
